mapper.select: SELECT c.name,c.name_eng,c.ABV,c.cocktail_detail,c.recipe,c.cocktails,c.cocktail_img, b.tagName AS basetag,t.tagName AS tastetag, s.TagName AS smelltag FROM cocktail c LEFT JOIN basetag b ON c.baseNo = b.tagNo LEFT JOIN tastetag t ON c.tasteNo = t.tagNo LEFT JOIN smelltag s ON c.smellNo = s.TagNo

SELECT c.name,c.name_eng,c.ABV,c.cocktail_detail,c.recipe,c.cocktails,c.cocktail_img, b.tagName AS basetag,t.tagName AS tastetag, s.TagName AS smelltag FROM cocktail c LEFT JOIN basetag b ON c.baseNo = b.tagNo LEFT JOIN tastetag t ON c.tasteNo = t.tagNo LEFT JOIN smelltag s ON c.smellNo = s.TagNo WHERE name=#{name}
SELECT * FROM cocktail WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')
select name, ing_name, ing_amount, ing_photo from cock_ingre cross join momol.ingredient i on cock_ingre.ing_num = i.ing_num where name=#{name}
